tool_description: Analyzes volunteer profiles against position requirements to generate compatibility scores and optimal role assignments.

volunteer_profiles.description: List of volunteer profile IDs to analyze

weight_preferences.description: Whether to factor in volunteer preferences

error_messages: No profiles provided: At least one volunteer profile ID must be specified.
Invalid position requirements: Position requirements cannot be empty.
Invalid algorithm: Algorithm must be skills_based, experience_based, or hybrid.
Profile not found: One or more volunteer profile IDs do not exist.
usage: Provide volunteer profile IDs and position requirements. Optionally specify matching algorithm and preference weighting. The tool generates compatibility scores and recommendations.

matches.description: Volunteer IDs ranked by compatibility score

compatibility_scores.description: Compatibility scores corresponding to each match

skill_gaps.description: Identified skill gaps for top matches

recommended_assignments.description: Specific role assignments recommended for each volunteer
